SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.location
Interface LocationSet

public interface LocationSet

Interface that provides a location set.

Method Summary
 void addLocation(Location loc)
          Location information is added.
 void addLocationSet(LocationSet locset)
          A location set is added.
 void clear()
          All held location information items are deleted.
 Location getLocation(int index)
          Location information in the specified index position is obtained.
 int size()
          The number of held location information items is obtained.
 

Method Detail

addLocation

public void addLocation(Location loc)
Location information is added.
If registered location information has the same value as the specified location information, the specified location information is not added.
Parameters:
loc - Location information to be added.

getLocation

public Location getLocation(int index)
                     throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Location information in the specified index position is obtained.
Parameters:
index - Index.
Specify a value not less than 0 and not more than the value obtained by subtracting 1 from size().
Returns:
The location information in the specified index position is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index position satisfies one of the following conditions:
  • The index position is negative.
  • The index position exceeds the value obtained by subtracting 1 from the number of held location information items.

addLocationSet

public void addLocationSet(LocationSet locset)
A location set is added.
Each location information in the location set indicated by the argument is added. Location information with the same value as the held location information is not added.
Parameters:
locset - Location set to be registered.

size

public int size()
The number of held location information items is obtained.
Returns:
The number of held location information items is returned.

clear

public void clear()
All held location information items are deleted.
